nodes.title: Added option to hide progress text with ui.hide_progress_text
Digest computation on packed 200 jars should only consider jar content
Added option to hide decorations with ui.hide_decorations
change condition in the method haveValidJavaVersion()
Added option to specify max Java version.
Add glob 'cleanup_pattern' to remove obsolete resources
Usage of Proxy.NO_PROXY prevents -Djava.net.useSystemProxies=true from kicking in
64bit windows system: use reg query tool to detect AutoconfigURL from registry
Provide default implementation for pac sandbox function myIpAddress
fix regression of PR 221: extract version before replacing variables
added more missing translations for russian
allow appbase and latest URL to use ENV variables too
fixed digesting with platform specifier for java, tracking and args
fixes #216 - send proxy configuration from launcher to application
Fix bug on mac while regenerating classes.jsa when path to java contains spaces
Fixed problem with incorrect display of messages in UTF-8 encoding
enable custom java local dir instead of hardcoded "java_vm"
Avoid overlapping of progress-bar-dialog and proxy-input-panel
create validation markers in separate .getdown directory.
Prevent Java VM update on Windows if vm is still in use
Fix the link to Java WebStart:
Use nresource=[native jar] to use native jars
Fix for #112, installing a newer JVM leaves parts of the old JVM
update Java VM: Checking Java version after getdown.txt has been re-fetched.
update Java VM: checking Java version again after getdown.txt has been re-fetched.
Introduced a new option called sysargs to bootstrap.properties...
add Systempath variable to pom.xlm because of local lib-repo doesnt work
Avoid calling overridable function from constructor
Avoid possible command injection (patch notes URL)
Small DoS mitigation: add start delay sanity check
Unsafe public fields in UpdateInterface class: make public fields final
Git ignore Maven and Eclipse local build artifacts
Use ROOT locale when lowercasing strings
Fix version info in README file
Bitmasks using wrong operator? ("anything | 1 != 0" is always true)
download control files using gzip content encoding
make ucode with pack.gz work again
bugfix when getdown stopped after downloading before installing
GetdownApp launcher: use local X.509 certificate from digest.txt.crt if available
Use JUnit Assert instead of the Java keyword
A code cache to support multiple app instances
Change build source and target to Java 6
Avoid corrupted resources when download is interrupted
Let the user close the getdown window on error, even when hideDecorations is set to true
Code quality fix - Assignments should not be made from within sub-expressions.
Code quality fix - Methods and field names should not be the same or differ only by capitalization.
Code quality fix - Utility classes should not have public constructors.
Code quality fix - Collapsible "if" statements should be merged.
added path to jregistrykey so that maven is able to compile the project
change build source and target to 1.7
Allow for a customized classpath variable.
